duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform variance analysis to identify trends, deviations, and opportunities for cost optimization.
Oversee the maintenance and reconciliation of general ledger accounts.
Assist in the preparation of corporate income tax returns and ensure compliance with relevant tax regulations.
Identify opportunities to enhance financial processes, controls, and reporting efficiency.
Provide mentorship and guidance to junior accounting staff, fostering their professional development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
